abstract: After losing a court ruling, Carl C. Icahn has dropped his $7.50-a-share tender offer for the studio on eve of a proxy vote.
snippet: After losing a court ruling, Carl C. Icahn has dropped his $7.50-a-share tender offer for the studio on eve of a proxy vote.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has called “cut” in his long-running battle for Lions Gate Entertainment.

headline.main: Icahn Pulls Tender Offer for Lions Gate
